item.endrem.nether_eye.description: §7§oA token given to anyone who can master the elementals
item.endrem.cold_eye.description: §7§oLost in the secrets of the ice maze
item.endrem.magical_eye.description: §7§oOne of the most highly guarded treasures in the Twilight Forest
item.endrem.black_eye.description: §7§oTravel to the deepest parts of the world
item.endrem.wither_eye.description: §7§oHas witnessed destruction. Maybe it also witnessed your stuff disappear
item.endrem.guardian_eye.description: §7§oHarvested from the skull of the Corrupted Champion
item.endrem.cursed_eye.description: §7§oDon't stray too far below the surface...
item.endrem.undead_eye.description: §7§oLook into the skies and see what you find
item.endrem.corrupted_eye.description: §7§oYou must bee pretty cool to get this eye
